text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The guy who thinks Finland i part of Russia?
The guy who didn’t know about the bounty on his own military?
The guy who said Covid19 would be down to zero in February?
The guy who suggested injecting a household cleaner or shining a light inside your body to kill the virus?
Idiot.
